name: scalajs-electron-quick-start
description: A minimal Electron application with Scala.js support

scripts.start: rm -fv src/main/electron/${npm_package_name}* && sbt fullOptJS && cp -v target/scala-*/${npm_package_name}* src/main/electron/ && electron src/main/electron/entry.js
scripts.debug: rm -fv src/main/electron/${npm_package_name}* && sbt clean fastOptJS && cp -v target/scala-*/${npm_package_name}* src/main/electron/ && electron src/main/electron/entry.js

author: Matthew Scharley
